classic.name: Notre-Dame de la Garde
classic.description: Grand basilica at the city's highest point, crowned by golden statue of the Virgin Mary by Lequesne.
classic.address: Domaine Notre Dame de la Garde, Rue Fort du Sanctuaire, 13006 Marseille, France

classic.name: Cathédrale La Major
classic.description: Huge 1800s neo-Byzantine cathedral featuring an opulent interior lined with murals, mosaic & marble.
classic.address: Pl. de la Major, 13002 Marseille, France
